channel.title: IPBan
channel.description:
Problem I'm having with IPbans is that players can still make a new account and come onto the server and break more rules etc.
Is there anything I can do? I remember a tut from wayyy back about a better banhandler, and that seemed to work, but I've lost it and can't find it anymore (Have done a ton of searching on here + google)
Can anyone help me out please?

item.title: IPBan
item.dc:creator: @I_nubnub_I I_nubnub_I
item.description:
@I_nubnub_I wrote:

strange, it works normally on my server (wich is pimp source)

maybe you should search in your server.java and change some there, i remember something with hostname and hostadress then change some of that so it shows ip adress and it could work then…

sorry if this looks messy, but i did that like 9 months ago, so i dont know what i changed it to

Read full topic

item.title: IPBan
item.dc:creator: @I_nubnub_I I_nubnub_I
item.description:
@I_nubnub_I wrote:

what kind of source you use?
I can IpBan normally on mine…

Read full topic

item.title: IPBan
item.dc:creator: @Fenam Fenam
item.description:
@Fenam wrote:

No, that doesn’t work. They’re already there, they can still log into new accounts though. Once they log out of the new account that account is banned, but it doesn’t serve much help.

I want something that checks their IP when connecting, and if it matches on the banned IPs list they get disconnect & banned or they aren’t able to connect.

Read full topic

item.title: IPBan
item.dc:creator: @I_nubnub_I I_nubnub_I
item.description:
@I_nubnub_I wrote:

put the ip/hostadress manually in the /data/ipbans.txt file (could be diff. name at you).

hope this worked;)

~I_nubnub_I

Read full topic
